item.title: Tesla Kills Legacy Models: Analyst Response Is Meh
item.description: Tesla's robotics shift isn't a surprise but raises as many questions as it answers, including whether the company can meet ambitious goals.

item.title: Waste Management’s “Boring” Business Is Powering a Quiet Rally

item.title: Starbucks Gets a Jolt After Earnings, But Will the Buzz Last?
item.description: Starbucks stock surged after earnings, but margin pressure, coffee prices, and valuation raise questions about whether SBUX can sustain the rally
